comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This sees likely to be a photo of en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archduke_Maximilian_Eugen_of_Austria It looks like a crop from a family portrait. In 1915 he would have been twenty, and this was clearly taken some years earlier. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Maria_Josefa_of_Austria3.jpg has a photo of Max with his mother and older brother said to be from 1910. www.youtube.com/watch?v=mNSGOH40CKY is a video made from stills of Maria Josefa. About 1 minute 36 seconds into the video, this photo occurs. The cuff at left is his brother Karl and the hand at right is his mother.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: And here is the larger picture -- in the LoC Bain collection, but not findable by searching for Maximilian!!

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for tracking down the full name for Maximillian and linking it to the full version of the photograph.  We will include some of your good information next time we update these descriptions.
